title: Sir Walter Raleigh's Sceptick, or speculations and Observations of the magnificency and opulency of cities, his Seat of government, and letters to the Kings Majestie, and others of qualitie : also, his demeanor before his execution.
author: Raleigh, Walter, Sir, 1552?-1618.
publisher: Printed by W. Bentley, and are to be sold by W. Shears ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Columbia University Library.
